Beast Herder Tunatun:
You are very brave!
Every day we lose a large quantity of the most gentle meat when these Mad pilferers drag them at us. And the most insulting - they only drag the smallest animals. It still to grow and grow, that we then could receive from them more than tasty meat...
Bring to me 300 Sel Mahum Manes, killing Farm Bandits and Beast Devourers. Will suffice already to them to ruin us.
